channel.title: Fixing an area
channel.description:
Well I was making a boss which requires noone else being in the area to kill,
now right now I have if player is blue (team) and player is not red (team) then die, or if player is red (team) and player is not blue (team) die.
Now what I want is that if there is a red player and blue player in the area he does not die, however he still dies.
How could I do this?
